data.name: ICE AGENT
data.detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) are responsible for preventing illegal immigration and preventing the unlawful traffic of goods into the US.
Have you ever thought what it would be like to be one of those agents? What choices they have to make on daily basis and what are the consequences of it?

Do you think you could survive as an ICE Agent, would you be immediately fired, die in action or become the most famous agent ever?

Here is your chance to check it out!

GAME FEATURES

Become an ICE Agent!


To become an ICE agent, you will need to:

Acquire the education and experience required for the position.
Find an open position on the USA Jobs website.
Undergo a background check.
Take and pass a written exam.
Take and pass a series of physical fitness tests.
Be hired as an ICE agent.
Receive on-the-job training once hired.

Job Training


All newly hired ICE agents must complete training courses:

Spanish language training program
Basic Law Enforcement Training Program
Physical fitness
First aid
Firearms
Law enforcement driving maneuvers

Career Description, Duties, and Common Tasks


ICE agents may either be involved with:

Involve the deportation process, such as apprehending and deporting illegal immigrants or criminal immigrants.
Inspect documents
Inspect cargo at customs checkpoints.
Examine the credentials of individuals entering the United States
Perform surveillance on persons of interest for either customs or immigration violations
Act as a liaison with other agencies.

Tasks, duties, trainings and courses requirements are based on real life data.

Start your career right now!

data.short_description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) are responsible for preventing illegal immigration and preventing the unlawful traffic of goods into the US. Have you ever thought what it would be like to be one of those agents? What choices they have to make on daily basis?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000, Shader Model 3.0, 512 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
